author: Author
email_support_message: If within 14 days you feel the course isn’t right for you, we’ll refund your payment — no questions asked. Simply email { email }.
refund_after_days: Not happy within 14 days? We’ll refund you — no questions asked. Email { email }.
payment_steps: Click the “Join Now” button and enter your email.
Complete your payment —  your {brand_name} login will arrive in seconds.
Watch the lessons, practice the techniques, and connect with the author.

faq.question: How long will I have access to the course?
faq.answer: Your access never expires — you can come back to the lessons anytime.

faq.question: When can I start learning?
faq.answer: Right after your payment is confirmed. You’ll get instant login details by email.

faq.question: How can I access my course?
faq.answer: After payment, we’ll email you a link and password to log in.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, Maestro, and Visa Electron.

faq.question: Can I purchase this course as a gift?
faq.answer: Yes. Enter the recipient’s email during checkout, and they’ll get access.

faq.question: What if I’m not happy with the course?
faq.answer: No problem — request a refund within 14 days and we’ll return your payment.

customer_support_message: Our support team is here for you anytime. Have questions? Email us at {email}.
save_your_seat: Join now and get the special price
terms_of_service: I agree with the terms of the <refund>Refund Policies</refund>, <terms>Terms of Service</terms>, <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

money_back_guarantee: 14 days money back guarantee: If the course isn’t what you expected, request a full refund within 14 days — no questions asked. Just email us at {support_email}.
unlock_special_offer: Wait! Grab These Premium Courses and Save Big!
course_at_discount: Before you complete your purchase, add these exclusive courses at huge discounts!
search_description: Discover courses tailored to your interests. Find the right path to grow your skills, connect with experts, and achieve your goals.
live_with_total_mind: Live with Total Mind, Body, Soul Balance
top_courses: Top Courses at Your Fingertips. Learn Hands-On, Connect with Experts, and Elevate Your Mind, Body, and Soul through Knowledge, Skills, and Growth.

1.message: I’ve transformed my career and connected with others who share my interests. It all started with a memory improvement course, and the results—better focus and clarity—motivated me to dive deeper into brain function. Now, I feel more confident and empowered in both my personal and professional life.

2.message: I never expected a single course to spark such a powerful shift in my mindset. What started as a small step toward self-improvement turned into a complete reset in how I approach learning, growth, and everyday decisions. I feel more capable, focused, and genuinely inspired to keep evolving.

3.message: Joining this platform sparked a huge shift in how I approach learning. I began with a creativity course and quickly noticed how it opened up new ways of thinking. Since then, I’ve been exploring more topics and finding real value in every step. It’s been a game-changer for my mindset.

4.message: What started as casual curiosity has turned into a personal growth journey. The emotional intelligence course helped me understand myself and others more deeply. I now navigate relationships with more ease and purpose, and that’s something I never thought a course could offer.

5.message: After years of feeling stuck in old habits, I took a leap and joined a mindset training. That one choice helped me reset how I approach challenges. I’ve gained clarity, motivation, and a supportive community that keeps me growing. It’s honestly been life-changing.

join_brand: Join {brand_name} and share your expertise as an Author!
learn_from_creatives: There are millions of people out there who want to learn from creatives like you. If you love to teach and share what you know, {brand_name} is a unique place to do just that.

get_started_steps.title: Find Your Perfect Course
get_started_steps.description: Explore our courses and find the perfect fit for you.

get_started_steps.title: Book your course today!
get_started_steps.description: Book your course today and take the first step.

get_started_steps.title: Learn at your own pace
get_started_steps.description: With unlimited access, you can watch courses as many times as you need.

general_faqs.question: What are {brand_name} online courses?
answers: {brand_name}'s courses are designed to help you cultivate inner peace and personal growth through practical, hands-on learning. Each course combines engaging video lessons with complementary materials, guiding you step by step to develop mindfulness skills you can apply in daily life. You'll also have the opportunity to share your progress, connect with instructors, and engage with a supportive community of like-minded learners.

general_faqs.question: When do the courses start and when do they finish?
answers: All courses are 100% online, so once they're published, courses start and finish whenever you want. You set the pace of the class. You can go back to review what interests you most and skip what you already know, ask questions, answers questions, and more.

general_faqs.question: Which course is right for me?
answers: {brand_name} offers 100+ online courses covering a range of topics, from meditation and stress management to mindful movement and self-awareness. Designed for both beginners and experienced practitioners, our courses provide accessible, practical guidance to help you integrate mindfulness into your daily life. With new classes added regularly, you can deepen your practice, discover new techniques, and cultivate lasting well-being.

pricing_faqs.question: Will I be charged taxes?
answers: Depending on where you live, you may be charged taxes in addition to your monthly membership price. If tax applies, you will see it stated separately on your emailed invoice. Tax rates are calculated based on your location or the billing information you provided at the time of purchase.
Should you have any additional questions about taxes you were charged, please contact our support at {email}.

pricing_faqs.question: Can I get a refund?
answers: At {brand_name}, our mission is to provide you with a unique and enriching educational experience. However, if you decide not to continue, we offer a refund for your first-time purchase.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us at {email}. We're happy to help!

keepPageOpen: Don’t close this page — your order isn’t complete yet!

danceCourseDescription: An online course on how to learn to dance beautifully and master your body, work through stress, internal blocks, and how to heal your psychological state through movement. The author of the course is an international class coach with 15 years of experience, a choreographer, professional dancer, and psychologist.

specialOfferText: You’ve unlocked a special offer available only on this page. You don’t need to commit fully right now — just say “maybe.” Maybe this is your chance to change everything within. And it’s your opportunity to set the course for your most rewarding, fulfilling path.
membershipSubtitle: Start Your Life-Changing Transformation with {brand_name} Membership
membershipDescription1: In today’s fast-paced world, making time for yourself isn’t a luxury — it’s a necessity. Self-care and reflection help you stay balanced, handle challenges with resilience, and unlock your true potential.
membershipDescription2: At {brand_name}, we give you the tools to look inward, discover your strengths, and create a mindset that inspires growth and lasting fulfillment.

brandValuesTitle: {brand_name} stands for the values and principles that truly connect with our community of learners and authors.
brandValuesDescription: We’re committed to offering only the highest-quality content and collaborating with exceptional authors. Our users are among the most thoughtful, insightful, and accomplished individuals. By bringing together outstanding content, remarkable authors, and an engaged community, we’ve built a space where people can thrive. And you are an essential part of it.
journeyMessage: Ready to begin your journey to success? Become part of our growing family!

1.message: I was looking for something to help me refocus, and I stumbled upon {brand_name} almost by accident. I started with a creativity and focus course, and it was like flipping a switch. Not only did my productivity improve, but I also started meeting others who shared my interests. That inspired me to dig even deeper. I ended up unlocking the full platform and haven’t looked back.

2.message: I used to feel stuck, like I wasn’t using my potential. Then I found {brand_name}, and everything changed. The first course I tried focused on cognitive health, and it really worked. I felt sharper, more focused, and genuinely more curious. I upgraded to the full platform to explore more topics, and it’s been such a rewarding journey.

3.message: Honestly, I never expected online learning to impact me this much. I joined {brand_name} out of curiosity, took a course on motivation, and soon after, my entire outlook started to shift. I began exploring new career paths and even made a few meaningful connections along the way. Getting full access was the best decision—I’ve been growing nonstop since.

4.message: When I started using {brand_name}, I just wanted to improve my concentration. But the changes went way beyond that. The courses helped me think differently, and as I evolved, I started connecting with people on the same wavelength. Eventually, I subscribed to the full platform because I saw how much it was helping me grow.

5.message: I started with a mindset course at {brand_name} while juggling work and burnout. The impact was immediate—my focus improved, and I felt a new sense of purpose. It led me to reconsider my career direction. The full platform has been a constant source of motivation and knowledge ever since.

6.message: What really stood out to me was how practical the lessons on {brand_name} were. After the first course on memory and focus, I saw real improvements. I wasn’t just learning—I was changing. I didn’t hesitate to upgrade once I realized how much more the platform had to offer.

7.message: The courses on {brand_name} helped me reconnect with my curiosity. I took one on learning speed and memory, and to my surprise, it actually made studying fun again. I began to notice similar thinkers entering my life, which pushed me to explore more. Subscribing to the full version felt like the natural next step.

trials_activation_faq.question: What's included in the subscription?
answers: As a {brand_name} member, you’ll enjoy unlimited access to all courses, anytime and anywhere, for as long as your subscription is active.
Plus entry to our exclusive community and early access to new releases.

trials_activation_faq.question: How to pay for the subscription?
answers: When you buy a course, you can add a free 7- or 30-day trial with access to all our courses. After the trial, your subscription renews monthly. Cancel anytime in your account or by contacting Support.

trials_activation_faq.question: How do I cancel or get a refund If I'm not satisfied?
answers: You can cancel your subscription anytime. Just go to the “Settings and Subscription” section in your account and click “Cancel Subscription.

privacyPolicies.title: About Us & This Policy
privacyPolicies.description:
At Edzen LTD. ("{brand_name}", "we", "us"), we value your privacy and know it's important. This Privacy Policy ("Policy") explains how we collect, use, and share personal information from users of our website (including {brand_name}.com), mobile app ("App"), and all related services ("Services").

Applicable Terms

Your use of our Services and any privacy-related concerns are governed by this Policy and our Terms of Service. These Terms are part of this Policy and include limits on liability and how disputes are resolved under Cyprus law.

By using our Services or sharing your personal information, you agree that {brand_name} may collect, use, and disclose your data as described in this Policy and the Terms.

privacyPolicies.title: Data We Collect
privacyPolicies.description:
We collect information in three ways: directly from you, automatically through our Services, and from third parties. Here's a breakdown:

Information You Provide to Us

  • Account Information: To access certain features (e.g., courses), you may register for a {brand_name}.com account. We may collect your email, name, phone number, and optional profile details like a photo, bio, or location. You may also opt in to receive emails or promotions.

  • Profile Information: Your profile may include public info like your username, photo, bio, and location. Choose carefully what you wish to share.

  • User Content: Content you submit (e.g., comments, images) may be seen by other users and course authors. We keep a copy and may link it with other data (e.g., feedback, ratings). You may request removal at {email}.

  • Communication: We collect information from emails, chats, phone calls, surveys, and support requests, including your contact details and our responses.

  • Usage & Purchases: We may collect data on your orders, activity, and feedback from others (e.g., author ratings or comments).

  • Author Accounts: If you're an author, we may collect your name, photo, bio, and content you contribute, such as user feedback or course material.

Information We Collect Automatically

We use cookies and tracking tools to gather data like your IP address, device type, browser, location, and usage activity (e.g., pages visited, links clicked, access times). We may also use email pixels to track open rates. This "Usage Data" may be combined with other personal information (see our Cookies & Tracking section for more).

privacyPolicies.title: How We Use Your Data
privacyPolicies.description:
We use your information to provide, improve, and protect our Services. This includes:

  • Setting up and managing your account, fulfilling purchases, and providing support.

  • Responding to inquiries and communicating about your use of our Services.

  • Improving features and functionality of our platform.

  • Sending newsletters, promotions, and updates from {brand_name} (you can opt out anytime).

  • Analyzing user behavior to enhance usability and user experience.

  • Preventing fraud, spam, and unauthorized access; protecting rights and safety.

  • Personalizing content and marketing based on your preferences.

  • Conducting internal audits, analytics, and performance assessments.

  • Protecting our systems and enforcing our Terms and legal rights.

  • Complying with legal obligations and responding to lawful requests.

  • Other purposes with your consent.

  • Using aggregated or de-identified data for analytics and improvements.

How We Disclose Information

We may share your information with:

  • Affiliates: Our subsidiaries, under the same privacy protections.

  • Service Providers: Third parties helping us operate the platform—e.g. payment processors, hosting services, marketing tools, analytics providers, and customer support.

  • Advertisers & Analytics Partners: Third parties who help us deliver relevant ads and measure performance across devices and sessions.

  • Legal Requests: Authorities or courts as required by law.

  • Protection Purposes: To protect {brand_name}, users, and others from harm or legal risk.

  • Business Transfers: In case of merger, acquisition, or bankruptcy, user data may be transferred to a third party.

Aggregated and De-Identified Data

We may share anonymous or aggregated data with third parties for research, advertising, or improvement purposes.

privacyPolicies.title: How We Use Cookies
privacyPolicies.description:
We and our third-party partners use cookies, pixel tags, JavaScript, local storage, and log files to automatically collect data about how you use our Sites and Services. We may combine this usage data with other personal information to help us:
– Understand usage patterns
– Improve and secure our Services
– Authenticate accounts and sessions
– Prevent fraud
– Personalize content
– Deliver targeted ads and perform analytics

Cookies

Cookies are small text files stored in your browser to help us recognize you. Some enable easier navigation or faster logins, while others track activity for personalization and analytics.

Most browsers accept cookies by default, but you can change your settings to block or notify you about them. Note that disabling cookies may affect how some parts of our Services work.

Pixel Tags

Pixel tags (also called clear GIFs or web beacons) are tiny images embedded in pages or emails. They help us track usage, ad performance, and email engagement (e.g., open rates and forwards).

You can disable cookies in your browser settings. However, some features may not work properly. Our Sites do not currently respond to "Do Not Track" signals.

privacyPolicies.title: Targeted Advertising
privacyPolicies.description:
We may partner with third-party ad networks, measurement services, and marketing platforms ("ad companies") to display ads on our Services and across the web. These companies may use cookies, pixel tags, device IDs, IP addresses, and location data to track activity and deliver more relevant ads to you. This also helps improve and measure ad performance.

Ad Choices

To learn more about how these ad companies collect data and how to opt out, visit: networkadvertising.org/optout_nonppii.asp.

Opting out doesn’t stop ads completely — you may still see generic or contextual ads on our Services or personalized ads from networks not in the opt-out program.

privacyPolicies.title: External Sites & Services
privacyPolicies.description:
Our Services may contain links to other websites or platforms (including those operated by affiliates or partners) that are not governed by this Privacy Policy. Your use of those sites is subject to their own privacy policies, and we are not responsible for their data practices.

In the next section, we’ll explain the choices you have regarding how we collect, use, and manage your personal information.

privacyPolicies.title: Stripe Payments
privacyPolicies.description:
We use Stripe for payments, analytics, and business services. Stripe collects device information to help operate and improve its services, including fraud prevention.

For more details, see the Stripe Privacy Policy.

privacyPolicies.title: Control Your Information
privacyPolicies.description:
Access and Update Information: You can access, update, or delete certain personal data by adjusting your account settings or closing your account. You may also contact us using the details in the "How to Reach Us" section to make access or correction requests. Please note that we may retain copies of updated or deleted information in our business records, as allowed by law. We may also verify your identity before processing any requests.


Marketing Communications: You may opt out of marketing emails at any time by clicking the unsubscribe link in our messages. Please note that you will still receive essential transactional emails related to your account.

privacyPolicies.title: Children’s Privacy
privacyPolicies.description:
Our Services are not intended for use by children under the age of 13 (or under 16 in certain jurisdictions such as the EU), and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn that we have collected personal data from a child without verified parental consent, we will take steps to delete that information promptly.


If you believe we might have any information from or about a child, please contact us at {email}.

privacyPolicies.title: How to Reach Us
privacyPolicies.description: If you have a question about this Policy, or you would like to contact us about privacy, please contact us at {email}.

privacyPolicies.title: Changes to This Policy
privacyPolicies.description:
This Policy is current as of the Effective Date noted above. We may update it from time to time, so we encourage you to review it periodically.


Any changes to this Policy will be posted directly on our Services. If we make any material changes that affect how we handle the personal information we previously collected from you, we will make reasonable efforts to notify you in advance—such as by highlighting the changes on our Services.

refundPolicy.title: Refund for a course?
refundPolicy.description: You can cancel, change or refund any course for any reason within 14 days of purchase.

refundPolicy.title: How to Request a Refund
refundPolicy.description:
You can request a full refund within 14 days of purchasing any course.

Want to switch courses? We can apply any refund fees—just email our Support Team at {email}.

Refunds are not available after the 14-day period.

Eligible refunds are processed within 1–14 days and returned to your original payment method. Bank processing times may vary.

Please avoid using chargebacks to request a refund. If one is initiated, we’ll provide full documentation, including service proof and communication records.

Chargeback resolution may take up to 50 business days.

refundPolicy.title: How to Request a Cancellation
refundPolicy.description:
To cancel a course or subscription, email us at {email}.

Our Support Team will confirm your request within 48 hours.

If you don’t hear back within 48 hours, your original request date will be considered the official cancellation date.

mainTerms.title: Terms of Service
mainTerms.description:
These Terms of Service (“Terms”) are a legal agreement between you and Edzen LTD. (doing business as {brand_name}) governing your use of this website and its content and services.


By using the site, you agree to these Terms. If you don’t agree, please don’t use the site.


Note: These Terms include a dispute resolution and arbitration clause with a class action waiver. You may opt out as described below.

terms_of_services.title: Policy Changes
terms_of_services.description:
We may change or remove any Materials, Services, or even suspend the Website at any time without notice. We can also update or modify these Terms. If changes are significant, we’ll post them here and email registered users at their provided address. Please keep your contact email up to date so you receive notifications.

If you disagree with any changes, your only option is to stop using the Website. Continuing to use it means you accept the updated Terms. Some pages may include specific legal notices or terms that override parts of these Terms—they are considered part of this agreement.

terms_of_services.title: Usage Terms
terms_of_services.description:
You’re welcome to use this Website for personal, non-commercial purposes only (“Permitted Purposes”) — enjoy!

These Terms grant you a limited, personal, non-transferable license to use and display the Materials for Permitted Purposes—only if you follow these Terms. You may not edit, copy, reverse engineer, or otherwise exploit the Website or Materials. If you make copies for personal use, you must retain all copyright and proprietary notices.

If you breach these Terms, your license ends automatically, and you must promptly delete or destroy any downloaded or printed Materials.

terms_of_services.title: Website and Services Use
terms_of_services.description:
Thanks for visiting {brand_name}! You can browse most of this Website without registering.

To access password-protected areas (like class content or user submissions) and certain Services or Materials, you must register an account. You also agree to follow our policies, which are available on the site and may be updated.

Restricted Access Areas.
To create an account, provide the following on the registration page:
– A valid email address;
– Your first and last name; and
– A username and password

You can optionally share more info to personalize your experience. After you register, we’ll decide whether to approve your account. While using it, you agree to keep your information accurate and up to date—either by logging in to update it or contacting us. Forgot your password? We’ll send a reset link to your email.

You’re responsible for following these Terms when using this Website, whether directly or through your account. You must handle your own access setup, cover any related costs, and keep your password (including third-party logins) secure. If you suspect any breach of your account or password, notify us right away.

terms_of_services.title: Payment Terms
terms_of_services.description:
You agree to pay all fees for using this Website and our Services, as outlined on our payment page during class enrollment.

We may suspend or terminate your account and access if your payment is late or your payment method is declined, revoked, or fails to process.

By providing a payment method, you authorize us to charge it for all applicable fees, taxes, and related charges.

You may cancel your account, but refunds are only available if requested within 14 days of the Service start date. Refund policies may change—please review our current Refund Policy.

We may update our fees at any time and may provide advance notice if needed. If you disagree, you can cancel your account by emailing us at {email} and stop using the Services.

terms_of_services.title: Subscription Terms
terms_of_services.description:
A subscription gives you unlimited access to all published {brand_name} courses for a set fee and duration, as outlined in your selected plan.

After the free trial or first payment, your subscription will start with auto-renewal. By accepting these Terms, you agree to automatic charges for each new period, billed in advance, until you cancel.

terms_of_services.title: Privacy policy
terms_of_services.description: We value your privacy and want you to understand how your information is used. Please review our Privacy Policy for full details.

terms_of_services.title: Links to Other Sites
terms_of_services.description: We may link to third-party websites, but we don’t control or review them and aren’t responsible for their content, services, or products. We don’t endorse them, and if you choose to visit these sites, you do so at your own risk and must follow their terms and privacy policies.

terms_of_services.title: Your Content
terms_of_services.description:
Some areas of this Website (like peer groups or projects) may allow you to post content (“User Submissions”). You’re fully responsible for what you share, and all submissions are treated as non-confidential and non-proprietary. We can’t guarantee you’ll be able to edit or delete them later.

By submitting a User Submission, you confirm that:
  • You either own all rights to your User Submissions or have secured the necessary rights to grant us the permissions outlined in these Terms.
  • You’ve paid (and will continue to pay) all required fees and costs related to the use or commercial rights of your User Submissions.
  • Your User Submissions do not violate any third-party rights, including copyrights, trademarks, patents, trade secrets, privacy, or other legal or moral rights.
  • You voluntarily agree to waive all "moral rights" that you may have in your User Submission;
  • The information in your User Submission is, to your knowledge, true, accurate, and not misleading.
  • Your User Submission complies with all applicable laws, including those on export control, consumer protection, unfair competition, anti-discrimination, and false advertising.
  • Your User Submission is not—and cannot reasonably be seen as—defamatory, hateful, biased, threatening, harassing, obscene, vulgar, pornographic, or an invasion of privacy.
  • You have not received—and will not receive—any payment or benefit from a third party for your User Submission.
  • Your User Submission does not include third-party website content, or any contact details (like emails or phone numbers) other than your own.
  • Your User Submission is free of viruses, spyware, adware, worms, or any other harmful software or files.
  • Your User Submission does not include any information you consider confidential, proprietary, or personal. and
  • Your User Submission does not contain or constitute any unsolicited or unauthorized advertising, promotional materials, junk mail, spam, chain letters, pyramid schemes, or any other form of solicitation.

By submitting a User Submission, you grant us a non-exclusive, irrevocable, perpetual, transferable, fully-paid, worldwide, royalty-free license (with the right to sublicense) to:
  • Use, share, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, perform, and display your User Submission (or any part of it), in any format or medium, now or in the future.
  • Use (and allow others to use) your User Submission for any purpose we choose, including commercial use—such as incorporating it, fully or partially, into any product, service, or technology.
  • Display ads alongside your User Submissions and use them for promotional or advertising purposes.

We may, but aren’t required to, review or monitor User Submissions. We can choose not to host, display, or distribute them and may remove or reject any submission at any time. We’re not responsible for loss, theft, or damage to your content. You also agree we may share your User Submission with third parties without confidentiality obligations.

By running our Services, we don’t endorse or guarantee the accuracy, usefulness, or safety of User Submissions. You are responsible for protecting yourself and your systems from harmful content.

terms_of_services.title: Disallowed Actions
terms_of_services.description:
You are permitted to use this Website only for the defined Permitted Purposes.
Any other use is strictly prohibited and considered a violation of these Terms.
All rights to this Website and its content remain our exclusive property.

Unauthorized use may result in legal consequences under Cyprus and international law.
Without our explicit written consent, you are strictly forbidden from using this Website in any of the following ways (not a complete list):
  • For any commercial or public use, including reposting on other websites or networks;
  • To alter, display, perform, reproduce, or distribute any content;
  • In breach of any local, national, or international law or regulation;
  • To harass, stalk, or cause harm to others;
  • To impersonate others or misrepresent affiliations;
  • To disrupt or interfere with the Website, servers, or networks;
  • To extract data using bots, scrapers, or similar tools;
  • To hack, mine passwords, or access restricted systems or accounts.

If you violate these Terms, you agree to cover all resulting damages and legal costs.
We reserve the right to take over the defense of any claim and expect your full cooperation.

terms_of_services.title: IP & Ownership
terms_of_services.description:
The {brand_name} name and logo are our trademarks. Other names and logos on this Website belong to their respective owners.

Unless stated otherwise, all Materials and their arrangement on this Website are our exclusive property, Copyright © 2025. All rights are reserved.
Except as allowed by law, copying, modifying, distributing, or publishing any content is strictly forbidden without written permission from the copyright holder.

terms_of_services.title: Copyright Violations
terms_of_services.description:
We remove User Submissions that infringe on intellectual property rights and may suspend or terminate access for repeat offenders.

Submitting a DMCA Notification

If you believe your copyright or IP rights have been violated, send a written notice to:

Attn: {brand_name} DMCA
Agent Email: {email}

Your notice must include:
  • Your physical or electronic signature;
  • Identification of the copyrighted or infringed work;
  • Details of the infringing material and where to find it;
  • Your contact info (address, phone, email);
  • A statement of good faith belief that use is unauthorized;
  • An accurate statement under penalty of perjury that you’re authorized to act for the rights holder.

Notices unrelated to IP claims will not be processed by the Agent.

Submitting a DMCA Counter-Notification

If your content was removed due to a DMCA notice, you may respond with a written counter-notification to our Agent that includes:
  • Your physical or electronic signature;
  • Details of the removed content and its original location;
  • A good faith statement that the removal was a mistake;
  • Your name, address, phone number, and consent to jurisdiction in your district (or any district if outside the USA), plus agreement to accept legal notice from the original claimant.

Termination of Repeat Infringers

We may permanently terminate access for users with multiple IP infringement claims, at our sole discretion.

terms_of_services.title: Services Provided “As Is”
terms_of_services.description:
THIS WEBSITE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "WITH ALL FAULTS." YOU ASSUME ALL RISK RELATED TO ITS USE AND PERFORMANCE.

WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES—EXPRESS, IMPLIED, OR STATUTORY—INCLUDING WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

NEITHER THE PLATFORM NOR THE AUTHOR IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY INJURIES YOU MAY SUSTAIN DURING PRACTICAL ACTIVITIES.

WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT THIS WEBSITE WILL BE ERROR-FREE, UNINTERRUPTED, OR THAT DEFECTS WILL BE FIXED. WE MAKE NO PROMISES ABOUT RESULTS, ACCURACY, OR RELIABILITY OF CONTENT.

NO INFORMATION FROM US OR OUR AFFILIATES, WHETHER WRITTEN OR VERBAL, CREATES ANY WARRANTY. WE DISCLAIM ALL EQUITABLE INDEMNITIES. OUR SERVICES MAY INCLUDE CONTENT YOU FIND OFFENSIVE OR OBJECTIONABLE. WE ARE NOT LIABLE FOR ANY HARM RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OR DOWNLOAD OF SUCH CONTENT.

terms_of_services.title: Liability Limits
terms_of_services.description:
WE ARE NOT LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES RESULTING FROM YOUR VIEWING, COPYING, OR DOWNLOADING OF MATERIALS FROM THIS WEBSITE.

TO THE FULLEST EXTENT ALLOWED BY LAW, WE WILL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES—INCLUDING LOSS OF DATA, PROFITS, OR REVENUE—EVEN IF WE WERE ADVISED SUCH DAMAGES MIGHT OCCUR.

OUR TOTAL LIABILITY WILL NEVER EXCEED $100 OR THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US FOR USING THIS WEBSITE—WHICHEVER IS GREATER.

terms_of_services.title: Indemnity Terms
terms_of_services.description: You agree to indemnify and hold us, our contractors, licensors, and their officers, employees, and agents harmless from any claims, costs, or legal fees arising from your use of the Site, Services, or Materials; your violation of these Terms, our policies, or any third-party rights, including intellectual property.

terms_of_services.title: Local Law & Export Rules
terms_of_services.description: We operate this Website from our headquarters in Cyprus. It may not be suitable or available elsewhere. If you access it outside Cyprus, you’re fully responsible for complying with local laws.

terms_of_services.title: User Feedback
terms_of_services.description:
Any submissions you send us (comments, suggestions, testimonials, etc.—collectively, "Feedback") via any channel (email, call, etc.) are considered non-confidential and non-proprietary.

Unless restricted by law, you assign all rights to us, and we may use the Feedback without attribution or compensation—for any purpose, including developing, marketing, or selling products and services.

If full assignment isn’t allowed, you grant us an exclusive, transferable, worldwide, royalty-free license to use the Feedback as we see fit.

We are not obligated to use, share, or display any Feedback, and you cannot require us to do so.

terms_of_services.title: Dispute & Arbitration
terms_of_services.description:
Please Read Carefully — This Affects Your Legal Rights.

This section covers how any dispute (claim, controversy, or legal issue, including fraud or negligence) between you and us will be handled. "Dispute" is broadly defined and includes claims involving our partners, vendors, or licensors if brought together with claims against us.

Binding Arbitration
By accepting these Terms, you waive your right to a court trial. All disputes will be resolved by binding arbitration, not by a judge or jury. Arbitration follows these Terms, and the arbitrator may award similar remedies as a court. You may opt out and retain your right to go to court by following the opt-out process below.

Pre-Arbitration Resolution
Before starting arbitration, you must email us at {email} with: (1) Your name, (2) Address, (3) A written claim description, and (4) The relief you seek. If we don’t resolve it within 45 days, you may proceed with arbitration in the USA.

Class Action Waiver
Unless both parties agree in writing, arbitration must be individual. No class, representative, or group actions are allowed. If you opt out of arbitration, this waiver does not apply.

No Judge or Jury
You understand that arbitration replaces the right to a judge or jury trial. Other court rights like appeals or discovery may also be limited or waived.

Severability
If any part of this section (except the class action waiver) is unenforceable, the rest remains in effect. If the class action waiver is invalid, this entire section is void, and disputes go to court.

Survival & Changes
This section survives account closure and Website use. If we update it, you can reject changes and keep this version for any future dispute.

terms_of_services.title: Terms Language
terms_of_services.description: These Terms and related documents are intentionally written in English. While we may provide translations, the English version will prevail in case of any conflict.

terms_of_services.title: General Terms
terms_of_services.description:
If we believe you’re violating these Terms, we may notify you and suggest corrective action.

Serious violations may result in immediate termination of your access without notice. These Terms are governed by the laws of Cyprus, without regard to conflict of law rules. Unless subject to arbitration, disputes will be resolved in Cyprus courts.

If any term is found invalid, it will be interpreted to reflect the original intent; other terms remain in effect. Our decision not to enforce a term does not waive our rights.

These Terms are the complete agreement between you and us, replacing all prior discussions. Provisions on ownership, warranties, indemnities, liability limits, and general terms remain in force after termination.

terms_of_services.title: Contact Us
terms_of_services.description:
If you have any questions about these Terms or otherwise need to contact us for any reason, you can reach us at

{brand_name} support
{email}

Edzen LTD

mainTermsSupport.title: {brand_name} Support is here to help you learn and succeed.
mainTermsSupport.description: If you need help while learning, our Support Center is ready to assist you.

supportFaqs.title: Can’t Access Your Purchased Course?
supportFaqs.description:
After purchasing a course on {brand_name}.com, your login details appear on the confirmation page and are also sent to your email.

  1. Check Your Inbox: Look for an email from {brand_name}.com.

  2. Check Spam/Junk: If it’s not in your inbox, it may have been filtered as spam.

  3. Email Typo: If you still can’t find it, there may have been a typo in your email address at checkout.

Can’t locate the email or think your address was entered incorrectly? Don’t worry — we’ll help restore access.

Contact us at {email} with your issue, and our team will assist you promptly.

Your learning experience matters to us — we’re here to make it smooth and enjoyable.

supportFaqs.title: Is a refund available if I’m unhappy with the course?
supportFaqs.description:
Sure! At {brand_name}.com, your satisfaction is important to us. If the course doesn’t meet your expectations, we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee.

You can request a full refund within 14 days of purchase if the course doesn't align with your goals.

To request a refund:

  1. Email Us: Contact us at {email} with your purchase details and reason for the refund (optional, but appreciated).

  2. Wait for Confirmation: Our Support Team will process your request and issue a full refund promptly.

We’re here to make sure you have the best learning experience possible.

supportFaqs.title: When does my course access expire?
supportFaqs.description: You have unlimited access — take the course whenever it suits you, at your own pace and on your own schedule.

supportFaqs.title: How soon can I begin the course?
supportFaqs.description: Right after payment and registration, you’ll receive an email with your access link and password. Log in to your personal account to find all course materials ready to begin.

supportFaqs.title: How do I access the course?
supportFaqs.description: After payment and registration, you’ll get an email with your access link and password. Use them to log in to your account, where all course materials will be available.

supportFaqs.title: How do I buy the course?
supportFaqs.description: You can pay with any major bank card — Visa, MasterCard, Maestro, or Visa Electron.

supportFaqs.title: How is the subscription paid?
supportFaqs.description:
When you buy a course, you can add a free 7-day trial for all courses and events. After the trial, your first monthly subscription fee will be charged automatically, then billed monthly.

You can cancel anytime via your account or by contacting our Support Team.

supportFaqs.title: Money was charged after my trial — how do I get a refund?
supportFaqs.description:
By making a payment on our website, you enter into an offer agreement with us. Section 2 of this agreement outlines the terms for registration and subscription billing.

When you start a free trial, you agree that auto-renewal will be activated, and you will be charged automatically at the end of the trial. Charges will continue monthly until you cancel your subscription via your account or by contacting us.

According to our Terms of Service and refund policy, subscription payments are non-refundable once the trial ends.

supportFaqs.title: How do I purchase a course as a gift?
supportFaqs.description: Just enter the recipient’s email address during course registration. They’ll receive a login email with access to their personal account.

supportFaqs.title: Can I stop my subscription anytime?
supportFaqs.description: You can cancel your subscription anytime from your {brand_name} dashboard, or email us at {email} and we’ll assist you.

supportFooter.title: Still need help?
supportFooter.description: No worries — our support team is here to help! Just email us at {email} with your question or feedback. We’ll get back to you as soon as possible to make sure your {brand_name} experience is smooth and enjoyable.
